pages.text: (843) 554-5021 Facebook Instagram Facebook Instagram Drinks Menu Fratello’s Martinis ~ DOLCI MARTINI ~ $12 Espresso Martini Van Gogh Double Espresso Vodka, Pearl Vanilla Vodka, Godiva Dark Chocolate Liqueur, & a splash of cream Death by Chocolate Frangelico, Godiva Dark Chocolate Liqueur , & Irish Cream Tiramisu Martini Van Gogh Double Espresso Vodka, Pearl Vanilla Vodka, Kahlúa, & a splash of cream Perfect Pecan Pie Maker’s Mark Bourbon, Dekuyper Amaretto, & Pearl Vanilla Vodka ~ DIGESTIVO ~ House Made Limoncello or Orangecello $10 ~ PORTS ~ Tawny Port or Ruby Port $10 Signature Cocktails House made Red or White Sangria $10 Limoncello or Orangecello $10 Basil Gimlet Nippitaty gin, fresh basil, lime juice, simple syrup $11 Boulevardier Bulleit Rye and Campari with a splash of sweet vermouth. Served neat or on the rocks $13 Cucumber Martini Pearl cucumber vodka, St. Germain Elderflower liqueur, lemon juice and simple syrup $14 The Godfather Glenlivet 12 year scotch and amaretto on the rocks. Finished with a sprig of smoking rosemary $14 Blood Orange Bellini Blood orange puree, peach schnapps and Prosecco $11 Milan Margarita Espolon blanco tequila, triple sec, simple syrup, fresh lime, and lemon juice. Finished with an amaretto floater and spiced rim $12 Prosecco Sunset White wine muddled with fresh oranges, hibiscus syrup and topped with Prosecco $12 Apricot Bourbon Sour Four Roses Bourbon, apricot brandy, lemoncello, amaretto $15 ~ Bottled Beer ~ Budweiser $4 Miller Lite $4 Heineken $6 Bud Lite $4 Yuengling $4 Corona $5 Michelob Ultra $4 Stella Artois $6 Heineken NA $5 * Ask about our rotating beer list * Wine List Sparkling Prosecco Costaross, Veneto 9/35 Red Impero Merlot, Abruzzo 10 Opera Chianti, Toscana 10 Calatroni Porcupine Pinot Noir, Lombardia 11/40 Bordinese Montepulciano D’Abruzzo, Abruzzo 11/40 Collevento Cabernet, Friuli 11/40 Remanso Malbec, Argentina 12/44 Origo Supertuscan (Sangiovese/Syrah, Cabernet), Toscana 12/44 Red Zinfandel Primitivo, Apulia 14/50 Tinazzi Corvina di Verona, “Baby Amarone”, Veneto 14/50 Prunicce Super Tuscan (Sangiovese/Cabernet), Toscana 15/60 Brunello di Montalcino “Notte di Note”, Toscana 80 Tinazzi Amarone, Veneto 90 White Impero Pinot Grigio, Abruzzo 11 Collevento 921 Rosé, Friuli 10/35 Antonutti Vini Chardonnay, Friuli 12/35 La Matota Moscato, Piemonte 12/38 Stingray Bay Sauvignon Blanc, New Zealand 13/45 Cà Montebello Pinot Grigio, Lombardy 40 Mon – Thur 11am – 10pm Fri & Sat 11am – 10pm Sun – Closed Click to Reserve a Table Delivery is Available Through Either or Uber Eats DoorDash Contact Us 1050 E Montague Ave, Charleston, SC 29405 United States (843) 554-5021 Monday – Thursday: 11:00am – 10:00pm Friday – Saturday: 11:00am – 10:00pm Closed on Sundays Follow Us Follow Follow Copyright © 2024 Fratellos Italian Tavern. All rights reserved. Website by Spark Local Marketing.

(843) 554-5021 Facebook Instagram Facebook Instagram Food Menu Antipasti Funghi della Angela The family favorite ~ whole capped mushrooms stuffed with the family secret $13 Cozze con Vino Bianco Sauteed mussels in a white wine, garlic, herbs, and butter broth $19 Pomodoro e Mozzarella House pulled mozzarella, roma tomatoes, chiffonade basil, shaved red onions, balsamic reduction with parsley infused olive $16 Antipasto dello Chef An assortment of Italian cured meats, imported cheeses and marinated vegetables $26 Gamberi Sauteed shrimp in a white wine, garlic, lemon, and butter sauce $15 Calamari Fritti Crispy calamari garnished with sliced sweet or hot cherry peppers $17 Salsicce Pane Sauteed sausage and peppers spun with mozzarella, wrapped and baked in fresh bread crust $14 Zuppa Zuppa del Giorno A daily selection of the chef’s house made soups $9 Insalate A protein may be added to any salad Chicken 8 – Shrimp 10 – **Salmon 15 – **Calamari 12 – Hot or Sweet Sausage 8 Insalata del Fratello Radicchio, romaine, baby arugula, grilled Bermuda onions, grilled artichoke hearts, golden figs, candied pecans, roasted red pepper and crumbled goat cheese. Drizzled with house made blood orange vinaigrette $17 Della Casa Mixed greens, cucumber, roma tomato, and shaved red onion. Drizzled with the dressing of your choice $12 Caesar Crisp romaine, garlic herb croutons, pecorino romano, tossed in house made Caesar dressing $15 Condimenti Balsamic Vinaigrette, Blood Orange Vinaigrette, Blue Cheese, Buttermilk Ranch, Caesar ** Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness Lunch - Stilatino Italian Sandwiches served with a side of aglio e olio Pollo alla Parmagiana Breaded chicken cutlet with house made marinara & mozzarella on an Amoroso roll $16 Salsiccia e Cipolla Hot or sweet Italian sausage sautéed with peppers & onions on an Amoroso roll $15 Pollo con Pepe Breaded chicken cutlet, hot or sweet cherry peppers, provolone & house made herb vinaigrette served on grilled Ciabatta $16 Antipasti Sopressata calabrese, prosciutto, mortadella, provolone, mixed greens, tomato, red onion & balsamic vinaigrette on grilled Ciabatta $16 Polpette House made meatballs & marinara topped with mozzarella on an Amoroso roll $15 Pollo con Rugola Grilled chicken, prosciutto, roasted yellow peppers, baby arugula, red onion & lemon pesto aioli on grilled Ciabatta $16 Melenzane e Mozzarella Breaded eggplant, tomatoes, peppers, onions, house pulled mozzarella & garlic herb oil. Baked open faced on grilled Ciabatta $16 ** Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness Pasta Penne alla Vodka Sauteed prosciutto, in a vodka tomato cream $ 16 Spaghetti con Polpette The classic, meatballs & house made marinara $15 Manicotti al Forno Fresh stuffed pasta with a seasonal blend of cheese baked to perfection $18 Cavatelli Pecorino romano, broccoli rapini, roasted red peppers, grilled hot or sweet sausage, garlic & olive oil $16 Fettuccine Alfredo Cream , pecorino romano & fresh herbs $ 14 Melenzane Rollentine Battered eggplant rolled with a blend of imported cheeses & house made marinara. Served with angel hair pasta $16 Linguine alle Vongole Fresh clams simmered in parsley & garlic $18 Ravioli de Casa A daily selection of the chef’s handmade raviolis ** Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness Dinner Lasagna A pound of perfectly seasoned meat sauce, sweet Italian sausage & a blend of imported cheeses $25 Penne alla Vodka Sautéed prosciutto, with a vodka tomato cream $22 Spaghetti con Polpette The classic. Meatballs and house made marinara $20 Linguine alle Vongole Little neck clams, simmered in parsley, olive oil, garlic, and butter $29 Cavatelli Pecorino romano, broccoli rapini, roasted red pepper, grilled hot or sweet sausage, garlic and olive oil $23 Manicotti al Forno Fresh stuffed pasta with a seasoned blend of cheeses and house made marinara, baked to perfection $19 Fettuccine Alfredo Cream, pecorino romano, and fresh herbs $22 Fra Diavolo di Mare & Shrimp, clams, mussels, and calamari, simmered with garlic herbs in a spicy marinara. Served over linguine $31 Shrimp a la Romano Pomodoro Shrimp, Italian herbs, crushed plum tomatoes, with white wine and butter. Served over angel hair pasta $29 Ravioli de Casa A daily selection of the chef’s handmade raviolis ** Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness Entrate Chicken Scarpariello Bone-in chicken, sweet or hot Italian sausage, cherry peppers and potatoes, sauteed with garlic and herbs, Served with broccoli rapini oreganata $25 ** Salmon Milanese Bread and herb encrusted with a pinot grigio and garlic cream. Served over roasted yellow tomato and spinach risotto $31 Chicken Cacciatore Bone- in chicken simmered with bell peppers, sweet onions, cremini mushrooms and Chianti in a rich tomato sauce with garlic, herbs and served with grilled herb potatoes $23 Melenzane Rollentine Battered eggplant rolled with a blend of imported cheeses and house made marinara. Served with angel hair $22 ** Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness Ricette Classiche – Chicken – 26 Veal 31 Parmesan Breaded and fried cutlet, baked with marinara and mozzarella Picatta White wine, lemon, garlic, herbs, capers and butter Marsala Sliced shallots and mushrooms in a marsala wine demi glaze **Consuming raw or undercooked meats, poultry, seafood, shellfish, or eggs may increase your risk of foodborne illness. Fratello's Desserts ~ DOLCI MANGIA ~ Cannoli An Italian pastry shell filled with sweet ricotta cream $7 Espresso Panna Cotta with Ganache Blended sweet cream, espresso, and Kahlúa. Served over dark chocolate ganache $10 Italian Cheesecake Sweet cream cheese with a classic graham cracker crust $10 Limoncello Creme Brûlée Classic custard blended with house made limoncello. Finished with crystallized sugar $10 Tiramisu Lady Fingers soaked in espresso and layered with a Mascarpone and cocoa cracker crust $9 Fratello’s Chocolate Cake Four tier chocolate cake covered with chocolate ganache flakes $10 ~ CAFFÉ ~ Regular of Decaf Coffee $3 Cappuccino $7 Espresso (Single or Double) $4/$6 Italian Coffee $10 Blend of Dekuyper Amaretto and finished with a sweet cream floater Mon – Thur 11am – 10pm Fri & Sat 11am – 10pm Sun – Closed Click to Reserve a Table Delivery is Available Through Either or Uber Eats DoorDash Contact Us 1050 E Montague Ave, Charleston, SC 29405 United States (843) 554-5021 Monday – Thursday: 11:00am – 10:00pm Friday – Saturday: 11:00am – 10:00pm Closed on Sundays Follow Us Follow Follow Copyright © 2024 Fratellos Italian Tavern. All rights reserved. Website by Spark Local Marketing.

(843) 554-5021 Facebook Instagram Facebook Instagram Fratello's Italian Tavern 1050 E Montague Ave, Charleston, SC 29405 United States Mon – Thur 11am – 10pm Fri & Sat 11am – 10pm Sun – Closed Click to Reserve a Table Delivery is Available Through Either or Uber Eats DoorDash Salads Entrees Lunch Desserts Fratello's Italian Tavern Fratellos Italian Tavern is located in Park Circle in North Charleston. We are family owned and operated and have passed down our recipes from generation to generation. We serve up “Jersey Italian” comfort food from our family to yours. We’re the little Italian place on the corner and we look forward to serving you. Fratello's Italian Tavern Fratellos Italian Tavern is located in Park Circle in North Charleston. We are family owned and operated and have passed down our recipes from generation to generation. We serve up “Jersey Italian” comfort food from our family to yours. We’re the little Italian place on the corner and we look forward to serving you. All rights reserved. Website by Spark Local Marketing.
